snippet.title: Beyond Legends | Project NEXT Cinematic Trailer | Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
snippet.description:
Project NEXT is releasing on Sept. 22nd! Will Zilong, Eudora, and Miya rise, or fall? Watch the cinematic for answers! Any thoughts? Share with us below. #ProjectNEXT#BeyondLegends

Add "Beyond Legends" to your playlist on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/6E6WeOPOgPDW6U4hYyOZGT
Youtube Music: https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=VRPCcXxuosQ
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/album/beyond-legends-single/1531576496
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08HX7RN3W/
"Beyond Legends" is also available on multiple music platforms including TikTok/Resso, Pandora, Deezer, Tidal, KKBox, NetEase, etc.

Music & Lyric Composition: Giorgio Satta
Singer: Nicole Carino

Lyrics:
Dust there's only dust
You're slipping to the dusk
There's nothing more
Besides your faults
That dig inside your soul

Pain there's no more pain
That fills your veins and tears
They broke your bones
They knocked you down
But there's still fire in your heart

Strive again
Defy the fate
Stand and fight
Beyond legends

Dry your tears
And don't look back
Rule the night
Beyond legends

Dust there's no more dust
That brings you to the dusk
Despite your fall could be this night
The legend will never fade

Fight your own fate
Be your legend
Burn bright like steel
You are legend

Strive again
Dry your tears
And don't look back
Rule the night
Beyond legends

Strive again
Defy the fate
Stand and fight
Beyond legends
